name: Color Sense
description:
Color Sense game shows a field of colored tiles. Detect primary dominant color and select tiles with little bit different color.  Each right decision and special stars will give you additional time. Test your vision to spot odd color tiles in the given time! The game is very simple and easy to play and to learn!

* Challenging

The number of blocks increases as you progress levels. Fight against bigger shapes field! Also, good color sense required to find all-stars on the field. Try to spot as many stars as possible. Play the game to master your visual perception and give challenge back to family and friends!

* Design

Modern Material Design colors palette is used. Each palette color name is displayed during the gameplay. The game has quality graphics and supports high-resolution screens as well.

* Competitive

Compare your highest level to the level of other players around the world! Master your sense of color to reach level 100, become a master of color vision!

Finally, let's test your color perception skills!

* Notes

- Please take a break after the game for a certain amount of time to protect your eyesight
- Don't hesitate to e-mail me if you have any questions, bug reports, suggestions or feature requests, 
- If you like the game, please like our page on facebook
